Class ShowDetailDonorInfoController

public class ShowDetailDonorInfoController
extends SearchDonorOrgController
This controller class handles the Donor details. Extends the SearchDonorOrgController class.

      public java.lang.String FindAge​(java.time.LocalDate DOB)
      Finds the age of the Donor.
      Parameters:

    • showPersonalInfo

      public void showPersonalInfo()
      Method for showing personal information of the Donor. Fetches the information from the database. Catches exception into the catch block and shows the error on the title of the window.

    • showDonationInfo

      public void showDonationInfo()
      Method for showing the donation information fetched from the database.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      This is the initializing function of the fxml components. When a the window is launched this method initializes these components. Establishes the connection with the database and upon fetching the data columns works with the property values.
      Overrides:
      initialize in class SearchDonorOrgController

    • pressBack

      public void pressBack​(javafx.event.ActionEvent even) throws java.io.IOException
      This method is here for the functionality of the "Back" button. This will redirect the user to the parent node that is the "root" which is sample.UserPanel.fxml. This hierarchical structure is for the simplicity of the system.
      Overrides:
      pressBack in class SearchDonorOrgController
      Parameters:
      even - , object of ActionEvent generated from click or Enter
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - which is a checked exception. Used to identify errors in i/p and o/p of a particular workflow.
